article_title: Who Is Right About Obamacare's Impact On Health Spending?

article_metadata.description: David Cutler's superlative record of achievement makes it doubly tragic that he now is deploying his talents to perpetuate one of the president’s greatest falsehoods regarding Obamacare: the claim that it would save the average family $2,500 a year in premiums.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: David Cutler's superlative record of achievement makes it doubly tragic that he now is deploying his talents to perpetuate one of the president’s greatest falsehoods regarding Obamacare: the claim that it would save the average family $2,500 a year in premiums.
